text: Green River is an American city in the state of Wyoming. It is in Sweetwater County where it is the county seat. The city has about 11,825 people. The city was started in 1868 in what used to be the Dakota Territory. Every year, a festival is held there called the Flaming Gorge Days where acts will perform music. Acts like Poison and REO Speedwagon have played there. == Arts and Culture == The Flaming Gorge Days is a festival. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official City of Green River website Category:Cities in Wyoming Category:County seats in Wyoming Category:1868 establishments in Wyoming Territory
title: Green River, Wyoming
